synopsis.text:
Houri Academy, a beacon of prestige and excellence, has long been the dream of 15-year-old Yuuki Kagami. His aspirations come to fruition when he earns a scholarship, only to find himself in an unexpected predicament. Due to a mix-up by his teacher, Ayana Kakinozaka, Yuuki is assigned to the girls' dormitory and must now masquerade as a female student to avoid expulsion.

In this new and unfamiliar world, Yuuki is compelled to navigate the complexities of dorm life while maintaining his disguise. To complicate matters, he finds himself sharing a room with his clumsy teacher, Ayana, who frequently puts him in awkward situations. Despite the challenges, Ayana is determined to help Yuuki maintain his secret, even if it means sharing a living space.

With his dreams hanging in the balance, Yuuki must tread carefully, balancing his studies and the constant threat of his secret being revealed. Will he manage to keep up the charade, or will the pressures of his double life prove too much to handle? Join Yuuki in this comedic and heartwarming tale of identity, friendship, and the pursuit of dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
